questions.question: What does cash burn look like by quarter for Logrocket in 2022?

primary_sources.description: Contains quarterly cash burn data for LogRocket
Contains cash flow data for LogRocket specifically
Contains P&L data that feeds into cash calculations

important_notes.company_separation: Must distinguish LogRocket from Pendo data - file contains both companies
important_notes.false_positives: The 'Forecast' tab contains Pendo cashflow only and should be avoided for LogRocket queries
important_notes.merger_model_caveat: Merger Model tab contains cash summaries for Pendo as well

questions.question: What is combined company headcount for YE 2023?

primary_sources.description: Should contain combined headcount but has an error

data_quality_issues.merger_model_error: The Merger Model has an error where it only pulls in Pendo headcount (1,146) and doesn't add LogRocket (139), though it should show the combined total of 1,285
